summary: FIRST MY CAR FLOODS FROM A RAINSTORM; THE SUNROOF HAD A DRAIN LEAK THEN THE COILS ON MY CATALYTIC CONVERTER/ENGINE BROKE, MY CAR WAS NOT DRIVEABLE, AND HAD TO BE TOWED. TODAY THE OTHER TWO COILS WENT AND MY CAR HAD TO BE TOWED AGAIN. WHY COULDN'T THE FOUR COILS BE REPLACED AT THE SAME TIME? MY CAR IS A VW PASSAT WAGON 2002. TS
